title: Ghosts in the Yew
description: A tale of violent magic, intrigue, and statecraft, the first Vesteal Series omnibus collection is the story of four who are banished beyond the edge of the map to a land of gnarled forests, ancient magic, and the site of a terrible murder. Their struggles to survive will put them at odds with their families, their nation, and the very powers that shaped the world.Ghosts in the Yew includes parts 1-5 of the Vesteal Series.
author: Blake Hausladen
